---
name: Bug Report
about: Report a bug or issue in the documentation
title: '[BUG] '
labels: bug, documentation
assignees: ''
---

## Description
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## Location
**File**: `path/to/file.md`
**Section**: Section name or heading

## Current Behavior
What currently happens or what is incorrect.

## Expected Behavior
What should happen or what should be correct.

## Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain the problem.

## Additional Context
Add any other context about the problem here.

## Proposed Fix
If you have a suggestion for how to fix this, please describe it here.

---

**Checklist**:
- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this is not a duplicate
- [ ] I have provided clear description of the issue
- [ ] I have specified the file and section where the issue occurs
